title: Export ATT&CK Navigator TTPs File
description: This connector allows exporting in the MITRE ATT&CK® format TTPs associated to STIX domain objects (SDOs) present in OpenCTI.This connector export files according to version 4.5 of MITRE ATT&CK® layer model (see: https://github.com/mitre-attack/attack-navigator/blob/master/layers/LAYERFORMATv4_5.md).
short_description: This connector allows exporting in the MITRE ATT&CK® format TTPs associated to STIX domain objects (SDOs) present in OpenCTI.This connector export files according to version 4.5 of MITRE ATT&CK® layer model (see: https://github.com/mitre-attack/attack-navigator/blob/master/layers/LAYERFORMATv4_5.md).
